column4: hi all, i installed ubuntu 5.10 in my comp yesterday and after download some updates, today it just randomly crashed
it seems that it crashed as soon as i start web brower or x-irc
or just click on update message box in the task bar
and i dual boot with windown xp
it seems that it crashed as soon as i start web browser or x-irc
if you ve set it up yesteray and didnt put too much time into it yet why not reinstall it?
i spent the whole day to set up the internet => install the driver
what kind of internet connection do you have?
and i doubt it cause i installed suse 10.1 before it did crash but less frequently
only centos 4.3 is not crashed at all
i dual boot with windoze xp
yeah me too. no crash yet with ubuntu
i thought of that but window runs just fine
